workflow.name: Automate company data enrichment with HubSpot, Sona, OpenAI & Google Sheets
workflow.description:
## Automatically identify ICP matches by enriching basic company records with Sona Enrich dataâ€”combining web scraping, AI analysis, and the structured attributes that define your ideal customer.

Import company domains from a Google Sheet, automatically analyze their websites with AI, enrich them with firmographic data via Sona Enrich, and sync the results to HubSpotâ€”so you can quickly discover and target your ideal customers.

## How it works

**Step 1: Data Input & Web Scraping**

- Reads company domains from your Google Sheet
- Scrapes each website's content via HTTP requests
- Extracts and cleans HTML content
- Removes navigation, footers, and noise

**Step 2: AI Analysis**

- Sends cleaned content to OpenAI Chat Model
- Extracts structured company intelligence (industry, positioning, features, personas)
- Captures and analyzes pricing, pros/cons, and value propositions
- Aggregates all AI results into standardized format
- Advanced users: You can modify the data that's generated and then add custom fields to HubSpot

**Step 3: HubSpot Preparation**

- Creates custom fields in HubSpot CRM
- Prepares AI-extracted data for import
- Splits aggregated data into individual company records
- Ready for batch processing

**Step 4: Enrich & Sync to HubSpot**

- Loops through each company one by one
- Enriches with the Sona API (firmographics, revenue, employees, funding, and more)
- Creates company record in HubSpot
- Formats and populates all custom fields
- Combines AI insights + Sona data in one complete profile

## What you'll get

The workflow enriches each company record with:

- **Web-Scraped Intelligence**: Business descriptions, features, and positioning directly from their website
- **AI-Analyzed Insights**: Value propositions, target personas, pricing models, and competitive advantages interpreted by AI
- **Firmographic Data**: Company size, employee count, revenue estimates, headquarters location, and more via Sona Enrich
- **Technographic Data**: Technology stack, platforms, and tools the company uses
- **Industry Classification**: Precise industry categorization and market type (B2B/B2C)
- **Funding & Growth**: Investment rounds, funding status, and growth indicators
- **Custom HubSpot Properties**: All data automatically mapped and synced to your CRM for immediate use

## Why use this

- **Complete intelligence gathering**: Combines three powerful data sources (web scraping, AI, and Sona enrichment) for maximum insight depth
- **Personalize at scale**: Leverage actual company intelligence to craft relevant, informed outreach that resonates
- **Intelligent segmentation**: Build precise account lists by industry, tech stack, business model, or company size
- **Accelerate research**: Eliminate hours of manual company investigationâ€”save 15-30 minutes per prospect
- **Improve conversion**: Engage prospects with context-rich conversations that demonstrate deep understanding
- **Enhanced lead scoring**: Build sophisticated scoring models with comprehensive firmographic and technographic signals
- **Automated updates**: Keep HubSpot records current with scheduled enrichment runs (daily/weekly)

## Setup instructions

**Before you start, you'll need:**

- Google Sheet with company websites (column named "Website Domain")
- OpenAI API key for AI analysis ([sign up here](https://platform.openai.com/))
- Sona API credentials ([get access here](https://platform.sonalabs.com/onboardingv2))
- Get an app token from HubSpot by creating a legacy app:
  1. Go to HubSpot **Settings** > **Integrations** > **Legacy Apps**
  2. Click **Create Legacy App**
  3. Select **Private** (for one account)
  4. In the scopes section, enable the following permissions:
     - `crm.schemas.companies.write`
     - `crm.objects.companies.write`
     - `crm.schemas.companies.read`
  5. Click **Create**
  6. Copy the access token from the **Auth** tab
- n8n cloud or self-hosted instance

**Configuration steps:**

1. **Prepare your data**: Create a Google Sheet with a "Website Domain" column and add 2-3 test companies (e.g., example.com)
2. **Connect Google Sheets**: In the "Get row(s) in sheet" node, authenticate and select your spreadsheet and sheet name
3. **Configure web scraping**: Update the HTTP Request node with your preferred scraping method or data source URL
4. **Set up AI Agent**: Add your OpenAI API key and customize the extraction prompt to define which company fields you want (industry, personas, features, etc.)
5. **Create HubSpot custom fields**: Review the "Create Custom HubSpot Fields" node and adjust property names to match your CRM structure
6. **Add Sona credentials**: In the "Sona Enrich" node within the loop, authenticate with your Sona API key
7. **Connect HubSpot**: Authenticate in both "Create a Company" nodes using your HubSpot API key or OAuth2
8. **Map enriched data**: In the "Format Custom Properties" node, configure how Sona and AI data maps to your HubSpot fields
9. **Test with sample data**: Run the workflow with 2-3 test companies and verify records appear correctly in HubSpot with all custom properties populated
10. **Add error handling**: Configure notifications for failed enrichments or API errors (optional but recommended)
11. **Scale and automate**: Process your full company list, then optionally add a Schedule Trigger for automatic daily or weekly enrichment

workflow.name: Enrich HubSpot Companies: Firmographics, tech & AI-powered custom attributes

parameters.content:
## ðŸ“¥ Step 1: Data Input & Web Scraping

**What happens here:**

- Reads company domains from Google Sheets
- Scrapes each website's content
- Extracts and cleans main content
- Removes navigation, footers, and noise

values.skipSelectors: script, img, style, nav, footer, header

parameters.text:
=Analyze the following scraped website content and extract structured information. Respond ONLY in valid JSON format with no preamble, no markdown backticks, and no additional text.

**Content to analyze:**
{{ $json.main_content }}

**Required JSON structure:**
```json
{
  "website_name": "Name of the website"
  "website_domain": "{{ $json.website_domain }}"
  "key_positioning_elements": ["element 1", "element 2", "element 3"],
  "target_audience": "Description of the target audience",
  "competitive_positioning_statement": "A clear statement of how this product/service positions itself against competitors",
  "summary": "Brief 2-3 sentence summary of what this company/product does",
  "feature_1": "First major feature or capability",
  "feature_2": "Second major feature or capability",
  "feature_3": "Third major feature or capability",
  "pricing_model": "Description of pricing model (e.g., freemium, subscription, enterprise, usage-based)",
  "list_of_prices": ["price tier 1", "price tier 2", "price tier 3"],
  "list_of_pros": ["pro 1", "pro 2", "pro 3"],
  "list_of_cons": ["con 1", "con 2", "con 3"],
  "personas_mentioned": ["persona 1", "persona 2", "persona 3"],
  "value_propositions": ["value prop 1", "value prop 2", "value prop 3"],
  "results": ["result/outcome 1", "result/outcome 2", "result/outcome 3"]
}
```

**Instructions:**
- Extract information directly from the content provided
- If information is not available, use "Not mentioned" or empty array []
- For pros/cons, infer based on the benefits and potential limitations mentioned
- For personas, identify job titles, roles, or departments mentioned (e.g., "Marketing Leaders", "Sales Teams", "RevOps")
- For value propositions, identify the key benefits or outcomes promised
- For results, extract any metrics, outcomes, or success stories mentioned
- Keep responses concise and factual
- Return ONLY the JSON object, nothing else

parameters.jsonBody:

nodes.name: Split Companies and AI Output into Items

parameters.jsCode:
const sonaData = $('Sona Enrich').item.json.data;
const loopData = $('Loop Through Companies').item.json;

// Format social handles nicely
let formattedSocialHandles = '';
if (sonaData.socialHandles) {
  try {
    const socialHandlesObj = typeof sonaData.socialHandles === 'string' 
      ? JSON.parse(sonaData.socialHandles) 
      : sonaData.socialHandles;
    
    formattedSocialHandles = Object.entries(socialHandlesObj)
      .filter(([key, value]) => value) // Only include non-empty values
      .map(([key, value]) => `${key.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + key.slice(1)}: ${value}`)
      .join('\n');
  } catch (e) {
    formattedSocialHandles = sonaData.socialHandles;
  }
}

return [{
  json: {
    properties: {
      // Sona enrichment fields
      tech: Array.isArray(sonaData.tech) ? sonaData.tech.join(', ') : sonaData.tech,
      tech_categories: Array.isArray(sonaData.techCategories) ? sonaData.techCategories.join(', ') : sonaData.techCategories,
      min_estimated_annual_revenue: sonaData.minEstimatedAnnualRevenue,
      max_estimated_annual_revenue: sonaData.maxEstimatedAnnualRevenue,
      sub_industry: sonaData.subIndustry,
      lat: sonaData.lat,
      lng: sonaData.lng,
      logo: sonaData.logo,
      employees_range: sonaData.employeesRange,
      estimated_annual_revenue: sonaData.estimatedAnnualRevenue,
      tags: Array.isArray(sonaData.tags) ? sonaData.tags.join(', ') : sonaData.tags,
      ips: Array.isArray(sonaData.ips) ? sonaData.ips.join(', ') : sonaData.ips,
      category: sonaData.category,
      sub_category: sonaData.subCategory,
      tagline: sonaData.tagline,
      specialties: Array.isArray(sonaData.specialties) ? sonaData.specialties.join(', ') : sonaData.specialties,
      ads_30days: sonaData.ads30days,
      ads_365days: sonaData.ads365days,
      ads_ytd: sonaData.adsYTD,
      social_handles: formattedSocialHandles,
      linkedin_url: sonaData.linkedinUrl,
      facebook_url: sonaData.facebookUrl,
      instagram_url: sonaData.instagramUrl,
      youtube_url: sonaData.youtubeUrl,
      tiktok_url: sonaData.tiktokUrl,
      pinterest_url: sonaData.pinterestUrl,
      github_url: sonaData.githubUrl,
      discord_url: sonaData.discordUrl,
      telegram_url: sonaData.telegramUrl,
      reddit_url: sonaData.redditUrl,
      snapchat_url: sonaData.snapchatUrl,
      medium_url: sonaData.mediumUrl,
      twitch_url: sonaData.twitchUrl,
      crunchbase_url: sonaData.crunchbaseUrl,
      g2_url: sonaData.g2Url,
      founder_identifiers: Array.isArray(sonaData.founderIdentifiers) ? sonaData.founderIdentifiers.join(', ') : sonaData.founderIdentifiers,
      num_founders: sonaData.numFounders,
      organic_keywords: sonaData.organicKeywords,
      organic_traffic: sonaData.organicTraffic,
      organic_cost: sonaData.organicCost,
      adwords_keywords: sonaData.adwordsKeywords,
      adwords_traffic: sonaData.adwordsTraffic,
      adwords_cost: sonaData.adwordsCost,
      github_has_organization_projects: sonaData.githubHasOrganizationProjects,
      github_has_repository_projects: sonaData.githubHasRepositoryProjects,
      github_public_repos: sonaData.githubPublicRepos,
      github_public_gists: sonaData.githubPublicGists,
      github_followers: sonaData.githubFollowers,
      github_following: sonaData.githubFollowing,
      github_is_verified: sonaData.githubIsVerified,
      linkedin_id: sonaData.linkedinId,
      
      // AI analysis fields
      key_positioning_elements: Array.isArray(loopData.key_positioning_elements) ? loopData.key_positioning_elements.join('.\n') : loopData.key_positioning_elements,
      target_audience: loopData.target_audience,
      competitive_positioning_statement: loopData.competitive_positioning_statement,
      summary: loopData.summary,
      feature_1: loopData.feature_1,
      feature_2: loopData.feature_2,
      feature_3: loopData.feature_3,
      pricing_model: loopData.pricing_model,
      list_of_prices: Array.isArray(loopData.list_of_prices) ? loopData.list_of_prices.join('\n') : loopData.list_of_prices,
      list_of_pros: Array.isArray(loopData.list_of_pros) ? loopData.list_of_pros.join('\n') : loopData.list_of_pros,
      list_of_cons: Array.isArray(loopData.list_of_cons) ? loopData.list_of_cons.join('\n') : loopData.list_of_cons,
      personas_mentioned: Array.isArray(loopData.personas_mentioned) ? loopData.personas_mentioned.join(', ') : loopData.personas_mentioned,
      value_propositions: Array.isArray(loopData.value_propositions) ? loopData.value_propositions.join('\n') : loopData.value_propositions,
      results: Array.isArray(loopData.results) ? loopData.results.join('\n') : loopData.results
    }
  }
}];

parameters.content:
## ðŸ¤– Step 2: AI Analysis

**What happens here:**
- Sends cleaned content to OpenAI
- Extracts structured company intelligence
- Identifies positioning, features, personas
- Captures pricing, pros/cons, value props
- Aggregates all AI results

## âš™ï¸ Step 3: HubSpot Preparation

**What happens here:**
- Creates custom fields in HubSpot CRM
- Prepares AI-extracted data for import
- Splits aggregated data into individual companies
- Ready for batch processing

## ðŸ”„ Step 4: Enrich & Sync to HubSpot

**What happens here:**
- Loops through each company one by one
- Enriches with Sona API (firmographics, revenue, employees)
- Creates company record in HubSpot
- Formats and populates all custom fields
- Combines AI insights + Sona data in one profile

**ðŸ’¡ Get your Sona API key:** https://platform.sonalabs.com/onboardingv2

# Enrich HubSpot Companies: Firmographics, tech & AI-powered custom attributes

## âœ… Setup Requirements

**Before running this workflow, you need:**

1. **Google Sheets** with a column named `Website Domain`
   - Add company websites (e.g., `example.com`)

2. **OpenAI API Key**
   - Sign up at https://platform.openai.com

3. **HubSpot Account & App Token**
   - Get an app token from HubSpot by creating a legacy app:
     - Go to HubSpot **Settings** > **Integrations** > **Legacy Apps**
     - Click **Create Legacy App**
     - Select **Private** (for one account)
     - In the scopes section, enable the following permissions:
       - `crm.schemas.companies.write`
       - `crm.objects.companies.write`
       - `crm.schemas.companies.read`
     - Click **Create**
     - Copy the access token from the **Auth** tab

4. **Sona API Key** (for company enrichment)
   - Sign up at https://platform.sonalabs.com/
   - Free tier available for testing

**ðŸ“‹ Output:** Fully enriched company profiles in HubSpot with AI-powered insights + firmographic data

user.name: Sona Labs
user.bio: Sona provides developer APIs for company enrichment and buyer intelligence. Send a company domain, receive firmographics, technographics, revenue estimates, employee data, intent signals, buying stages and more. We're the data layer that transforms domains into actionable data for enriched company profiles and buyer intelligence.
